lnkmx (LinkMAX) â€” Micro-Business OS: AI-powered page builder, CRM, and lead management platform.

What is lnkmx?
lnkmx is an operating system for micro-businesses that combines:
- AI Page Builder: Create professional mini-sites in 2 minutes with 25+ block types
- Built-in CRM: Manage leads, track interactions, and automate follow-ups
- Lead Forms: Collect client information with customizable forms
- Telegram Notifications: Get instant alerts about new leads
- Analytics: Track page views, clicks, and conversions
- Booking System: Allow clients to book appointments online

Key pages:
- https://lnkmx.my/ (home - micro-business OS, page builder, CRM)
- https://lnkmx.my/pricing (plans and pricing)
- https://lnkmx.my/gallery (examples and templates)
- https://lnkmx.my/alternatives (comparisons)
- https://lnkmx.my/terms (terms)
- https://lnkmx.my/privacy (privacy)

Use cases:
- Freelancers: Showcase services and pricing
- Small businesses: Catalog, map, and booking
- Creators: Courses, merch, and content links
- Experts: Schedule, pricing, and testimonials
- Salons: Online booking and price list

Languages:
- Russian: https://lnkmx.my/?lang=ru
- English: https://lnkmx.my/?lang=en
- Kazakh: https://lnkmx.my/?lang=kk

Contact:
- support: admin@lnkmx.my
